name: Green Tea (Matcha) Oats Flaxseed Pull Apart Rolls (vegan)
description: Green Tea (Matcha) Oats Flaxseed Pull Apart Rolls. Soft, fluffy and delicious. These rolls make a great snack. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: about a cup of warm water

recipeInstructions.text: Add yeast to half cup (125ml) of water and sugar and mix well. Let sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add yeast to half cup (125ml) of water and sugar and mix well. Let sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Grind/blend the oats and flax seeds into coarse flour and add to the yeast mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Grind/blend the oats and flax seeds into coarse flour and add to the yeast mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the softened butter, flour, salt, cinnamon, cardamom and green tea and start mixing vigorously.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the softened butter, flour, salt, cinnamon, cardamom and green tea and start mixing vigorously.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the dough seems to come together, knead for 5-6 minutes to make into a smooth and soft dough, use some more water if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the dough seems to come together, knead for 5-6 minutes to make into a smooth and soft dough, use some more water if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in well greased container(atleast double the size of the dough). Spritz top with oil spray and cover with heavy towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in well greased container(atleast double the size of the dough). Spritz top with oil spray and cover with heavy towel.

recipeInstructions.text: Let dough rise for an hour or until it doubles.
recipeInstructions.name: Let dough rise for an hour or until it doubles.

recipeInstructions.text: Take dough out and using a little flour make it into an long baguette shape. Cut small portions and shape them into a ball.
recipeInstructions.name: Take dough out and using a little flour make it into an long baguette shape. Cut small portions and shape them into a ball.

recipeInstructions.text: Place balls an inch apart on a baking tray or a baking pan. Spritz top with water and sprinkle with some poppy seeds (optional).
recipeInstructions.name: Place balls an inch apart on a baking tray or a baking pan. Spritz top with water and sprinkle with some poppy seeds (optional).

recipeInstructions.text: Spritz some oil and cover with heavy towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Spritz some oil and cover with heavy towel.

recipeInstructions.text: Let rise in a warm place for 45 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Let rise in a warm place for 45 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove towel and bake at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until the tops are all golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove towel and bake at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until the tops are all golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from container and let cool for atleast half an hour!
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from container and let cool for atleast half an hour!

recipeInstructions.text: Enjoy warm with butter or tea!
recipeInstructions.name: Enjoy warm with butter or tea!

keywords: flaxseed bread recipe, matcha bread, vegan bread recipe
